Name: Drako Bot
Author: eggs@goover.dev
StartupCommand: if [[ ! -z ${NODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then npm install ${NODE_PACKAGES}; fi; if [ -f /home/container/package.json ]; then npm install; fi; node /home/container/{{JS_FILE}}
InstallScript:
#!/bin/bash

#Variables
clear
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Drako-Bot installscript${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

mkdir -p /mnt/server/
cd /mnt/server/

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}installing dependencies...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
apt update
apt install -y build-essential libtool python3 git tar

echo -e "${BLUE}-----------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}updating npm to latest. please wait...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-----------------------------------------------------${NC}"
npm install -g npm@latest
npm --version
echo -e "${GREEN}..done${NC}"

mkdir -p /mnt/server/
cd /mnt/server/

if [ -d "/mnt/server/mongodb" ]
then
    cd /mnt/server/
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}backup mongodb...${NC}"
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    REINSTALL=true
    tar -czf mongodb_backup.tar.gz mongodb/
    mv mongodb_backup.tar.gz /tmp
    echo -e "${GREEN}done${NC}"
fi

tar -czf mongodb_back.tar.gz mongodb/
mv mongodb_back.tar.gz /tmp

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Installing nodejs packages${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

if [ -f /mnt/server/package.json ]; then
    /usr/local/bin/npm install --production
fi

mkdir mongodb/
if [ "$REINSTALL" == "true" ]
then
    cd /mnt/server
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}reinstall...${NC}"
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    mv /tmp/mongodb_backup.tar.gz /mnt/server
    tar xf mongodb_backup.tar.gz
    rm mongodb_backup.tar.gz
    echo -e "${GREEN}done${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}fresh install${NC}"
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
fi

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}Installation completed${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}Please upload now the Botfiles and configure the bot.${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
exit 0

Variables.Description: The file that starts the app
